袖香炉: (そでごうろ) - portable incense burner (ball-shaped and carried in one's clothes)
袘: (ふき) - turned-back hem of a kimono
袢天: (はんてん) - traditional short winter coat resembling a haori without gussets; livery coat; (半天 only) half the sky; (半天 only) mid-air/middle of the sky
袢纏: (はんてん) - traditional short winter coat resembling a haori without gussets; livery coat; (半天 only) half the sky; (半天 only) mid-air/middle of the sky
被: (oi/koumu) - incur , indicates the target of an activity, -ee (e.g. employee, examinee, trustee)
被う: (おおう) - to cover; to hide; to conceal; to wrap; to disguise
被く: (かづく) - to wear on the head; to have cloth, clothing, etc. bestowed upon one by their lord or master/to wear such cloth on the left shoulder; to be injured
被ける: (かづける) - to place a hat, etc. on someone's head; to award clothing to someone as a reward or a souvenir; to place the blame or burden of responsibility on someone else; to use something as an excuse or a pretext
被さる: (かぶさる) - to hang over/to cover; to take on a responsibility/to become a burden
被せ: (きせ) - not folding on a stitch but placing the fold (2mm) deeper past the stitch, folding the excess back to cover the stitch
被せる: (かぶせる) - to cover (with something); to put on (e.g. on someone else's head); to plate something (with a metal); to pour or dash a liquid (on something); to charge (a person with a guilt)
被せ分: (きせぶん) - excess of fold beyond the stitching seam
被ばく: (ひばく) - being exposed to radiation; radiation exposure
被り: (かぶり) - headdress; crown; covering; fogging (photography); blushing
被り笠: (かぶりがさ) - conical hat (East-Asian style); coolie hat
被る: (こうむる) - to suffer; to receive; to sustain
被リンク: (ひリンク) - link to (a site, as used in page ranking that site)
被保佐人: (ひほさにん) - person subject to a conservatorship or curatorship
被保護国: (ひほごこく) - protectorate (country); dependency; dependent state
被修飾名詞: (ひしゅうしょくめいし) - modified noun
被修飾語: (ひしゅうしょくご) - modified word
被写界深度: (ひしゃかいしんど) - depth of field (photography)
被占領国: (ひせんりょうこく) - occupied country
被占領期: (ひせんりょうき) - occupation period (e.g. post-WWII period during which the Allies occupied Japan)
被告人: (ひこくにん) - accused; defendant; prisoner at the bar
被告席: (ひこくせき) - defendant's seat; the dock
被圧迫民族: (ひあっぱくみんぞく) - oppressed peoples; discriminated ethnicity
被子植物: (ひししょくぶつ) - angiosperm; flowering plants
被子植物門: (ひししょくぶつもん) - Magnoliophyta; Angiospermae; phylum of flowering plants
被官: (ひかん) - lower government office (ritsuryo period); servant of a higher ranking person (during the middle ages)/retainer; servant of an urban family; serf
被害を受ける: (ひがいをうける) - to be damaged; to receive damage
被害地: (ひがいち) - the stricken area; damaged area
被害届: (ひがいとどけ) - report of damage; damage report
被害届け: (ひがいとどけ) - report of damage; damage report
被害総額: (ひがいそうがく) - total amount of damage
被害者: (ひがいしゃ) - victim; injured party; sufferer
被害者意識: (ひがいしゃいしき) - sense of being victimized
被害額: (ひがいがく) - amount (extent) of damage; damage
被差別部落民: (ひさべつぶらくみん) - Burakumin (modern-day descendants of Japan's feudal outcast group)
被引用回数: (ひいんようかいすう) - citation index; CI
被後見人: (ひこうけんじん) - ward (of the court)
被扶養者: (ひふようしゃ) - dependent; person receiving support; person being supported
被担保債権額: (ひたんぽさいけんがく) - secured claims
被搾取階級: (ひさくしゅかいきゅう) - exploited classes
被昇天: (ひしょうてん) - Assumption (of the body and soul of Mary into heaven)
被検者: (ひけんしゃ) - (被験者 only) subject (of a medical experiment, etc.)/test subject/trial subject/testee; examinee (of a full-body scan, etc.)
被治者: (ひちしゃ) - the ruled; the governed
被災: (hisai) - ser vítima de (algum desastre), sofrer de
被災地: (ひさいち) - area struck (by some disaster); location of a disaster
被災地区: (ひさいちく) - stricken area; affected district
被爆: (hibaku) - being bombed; being A-bombed, being nuked, being exposed to radiation (de uma explosão atômica)
被爆国: (ひばくこく) - country that was the victim of nuclear bombing
被爆者: (ひばくしゃ) - atomic bomb victim; bomb victim
被爆者援護法: (ひばくしゃえんごほう) - Atomic Bomb Victims' Relief Law
被用者保険: (ひようしゃほけん) - employee insurance
被管: (ひかん) - lower government office (ritsuryo period); servant of a higher ranking person (during the middle ages)/retainer; servant of an urban family; serf
被管理システム: (ひかんりシステム) - managed (open) system
被管理開放型システム: (ひかんりかいほうがたシステム) - managed open system
被葬者: (ひそうしゃ) - the entombed; the person buried (usually in burial mounds, etc.)
被虐: (ひぎゃく) - suffering (as a result of maltreatment)
被虐待児: (ひぎゃくたいじ) - physically abused child; battered child
被虐待児症候群: (ひぎゃくたいじしょうこうぐん) - battered child syndrome
被虐性愛者: (ひぎゃくせいあいしゃ) - masochist
